title.rendered: “Southern Command’s Continual Battle: Strategies and Intensities in Modern Warfare”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The Commander of the Southern Command Brigade General: “The fight will continue in a variety of methods, at various intensities and in changing forms”

The Commander of the Southern Command, Major General Yaron Finkelman, carried out a situation assessment today (Monday) with the forces fighting in the Brigade General, along with the commander of the 162nd Division, Colonel Itzik Cohen, the commander of the Nahal Brigade, Colonel Yair Zukerman, and the commander of the 401st Brigade, Colonel Binyamin Aharon.

Attached documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3TFzfU7

Attached images on the subject: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC93875
